trans-unit.source: Associates a source table with a table in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>, and is implemented by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> class, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的資料表中的來源資料表<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>，而且所實作<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>類別，.NET Framework 資料提供者在一般使用。

trans-unit.source: The ITableMapping interface allows an inheriting class to implement a TableMapping class, which associates a data source column with a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column.
trans-unit.target: ITableMapping 介面可讓繼承的類別來實作 TableMapping 類別，其會將資料來源資料行<xref:System.Data.DataSet>資料行。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[DataAdapter DataTable 和 DataColumn 對應](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An application does not create an instance of the ITableMapping interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits ITableMapping.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式不會直接建立 ITableMapping 介面的執行個體，但是會建立繼承 ITableMapping 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit ITableMapping must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: 繼承 ITableMapping 的類別必須實作繼承的成員，和通常用來定義其他成員將提供者特有的功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, the ITableMapping interface defines the <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.DataSetTable%2A> property.
In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> class inherits this property, and also defines the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping.GetDataTableBySchemaAction%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 接著，<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>類別會繼承這個屬性，而且也會定義<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping.GetDataTableBySchemaAction%2A>方法。</xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping.GetDataTableBySchemaAction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>

trans-unit.source: Gets the derived <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
A collection of data column mappings.
Gets or sets the case-insensitive name of the table within the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內的資料表名稱不區分大小寫<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The case-insensitive name of the table within the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料表不區分大小寫名稱<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the case-sensitive name of the source table.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定區分大小寫的來源資料表名稱。

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive name of the source table.
trans-unit.target: 來源資料表的名稱區分大小寫。
